summary: The diff updates Sakthi Snacks seeded menu item imageUrl values in backend/main.mo, but uses non-requested asset filenames. The diff does not show the required generated image files being added under frontend/public/assets/generated/, and the shown portion of frontend/src/utils/imageFallbacks.ts does not include the requested Sakthi dish-name mappings.

missing_requirements.requirement: Add four generated Sakthi Snacks dish images as static assets under frontend/public/assets/generated/ with exact filenames: dish-sakthi-jalebi.dim_512x512.png, dish-sakthi-vegetable-frankie-roll.dim_512x512.png, dish-sakthi-vegetable-momos.dim_512x512.png, dish-sakthi-vegetable-sandwich.dim_512x512.png.
missing_requirements.reason: Diff shows no added files at all (Added: 0), so the required image assets are not present in the change summary.
evidence: File diff summary: Added: 0, Modified: 4, Removed: 0

missing_requirements.requirement: Update frontend/src/utils/imageFallbacks.ts DISH_NAME_TO_IMAGE mapping for jalebi, vegetable frankie roll, vegetable momos, vegetable momos (6 pcs), and vegetable sandwich to point to /assets/generated/dish-sakthi-*.dim_512x512.png paths.

missing_requirements.requirement: Update backend/main.mo seeded Sakthi Snacks (restaurantId=7) menu items so imageUrl values for Jalebi, Vegetable Frankie Roll, Vegetable Momos, and Vegetable Sandwich correspond to the new generated static assets under /assets/generated/ using the specified dish-sakthi-*.dim_512x512.png filenames (or set to empty string to rely on name-based mapping).

hallucinated_features.description: Set Sakthi Snacks restaurant cover imageUrl to /assets/generated/restaurant-indian-sakthi-snacks.dim_1200x600.png.
